TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDocumentWriter extends System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter

summary.span: 提供用于写入 XPS 文档或打印队列的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to write to an XPS document or print queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有没有构造函数。 has no constructor. 若要创建，使用静态方法类，或使用某个静态方法的类。To create an , use the static method of the class or use one of the static methods of the class. 文档或创建队列成为将写入到目标。The document or the queue that creates the becomes the target to which it writes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 类的实例。The following example shows how to create an instance of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将写入到同一目标或作为创建。The writes to the same target or as the that creates the . 此方法不会验证或修改指定`documentPrintTicket`为特定。This method does not validate or modify the specified `documentPrintTicket` for a particular . 如有必要，使用方法来创建特定于和有效对指定的打印机。If necessary, use the method to create a that is specific to the and valid for a specified printer.

summary.span: 将指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档同步写入目标 或 。

span.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管类具有单数名称，可以是一个或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将添加到集的源中的元素目标中的元素或。This method adds the elements in the source to the set of elements in the target or . 这方法将重新序列化指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，这将删除所有内容从不需要由保留[XML 纸张规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。This method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 重新序列化还将删除所有扩展标记，包括任何扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 根据设计，此方法不会调用事件。By design this method does not call the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Write (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance void Write(string documentPath, valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel) cil managed
Public Sub Write (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
public: void Write(System::String ^ documentPath, System::Windows::Xps::XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
override this.Write : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

param.name: documentPath
param.span: 源文档的路径。

span.span: The path of the source document.

param.name: notificationLevel
param.span: 对是否已启用通知的指示。

span.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

summary.span: 将指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档同步写入目标 或 。

span.span: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`notificationLevel`处于禁用状态，将复制的序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]到目标文档或创建。When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . 当`notificationLevel`已启用，首先反序列化文档，再对其，重新，然后输出每个页时将其写入到目标的进度通知。When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. 尽管类具有单数名称，可以是一个或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将添加中的源序列的元素目标中的元素或。This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . 如果`notificationLevel`指定为，仅当文档序列化时，不会打印时生成通知。If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. 若要接收的通知文档必须重新序列。To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. 文档时重新序列中的所有内容不需要由保留[XML 纸张规范 (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)中删除。When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. 重新序列化还将删除所有扩展标记，包括任何扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 如果`notificationLevel`指定为文档将不会重新序列化并扩展的任何内容将被保留，即使在打印时。If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. 根据设计，此方法不会调用事件。By design this method does not call the event.

span.span: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管类具有单数名称，可以是一个或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将添加到集的源中的元素目标中的元素或。This method adds the elements in the source to the set of elements in the target or . 这方法将重新序列化指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，这将删除所有内容从不需要由保留[XML 纸张规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。This method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 重新序列化还将删除所有扩展标记，包括任何扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 根据设计，此方法不会调用事件。By design this method does not call the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteAsync (string documentPath, System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
.method public hidebysig instance void WriteAsync(string documentPath, valuetype System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel) cil managed
Public Sub WriteAsync (documentPath As String, notificationLevel As XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
public: void WriteAsync(System::String ^ documentPath, System::Windows::Xps::XpsDocumentNotificationLevel notificationLevel);
override this.WriteAsync : string * System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel -> unit

param.name: documentPath
param.span: 源文档的路径。

span.span: The path of the source document.

param.name: notificationLevel
param.span: 对是否已启用通知的指示。

span.span: An indication of whether notification is enabled.

summary.span: 将带有通知选项的指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档异步写入目标 或 中。

span.span: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document with notification option to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`notificationLevel`处于禁用状态，将复制的序列化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]到目标文档或创建。When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document to the target or that created the . 当`notificationLevel`已启用，首先反序列化文档，再对其，重新，然后输出每个页时将其写入到目标的进度通知。When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output. 尽管类具有单数名称，可以是一个或一组多个文档。Although the class has a singular name, an can be one or a set of multiple documents. 此方法将添加中的源序列的元素目标中的元素或。This method adds the elements in the source to the sequence of elements in the target or . 如果`notificationLevel`指定为，仅当文档序列化时，不会打印时生成通知。If `notificationLevel` is specified as , notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed. 若要接收的通知文档必须重新序列。To receive notifications the document must be reserialized. 文档时重新序列中的所有内容不需要由保留[XML 纸张规范](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)中删除。When a document is reserialized all content from the that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed. 重新序列化还将删除所有扩展标记，包括任何扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]内容。The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] content. 如果`notificationLevel`指定为文档将不会重新序列化并扩展的任何内容将被保留，即使在打印时。If `notificationLevel` is specified as the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed. 根据设计，此方法不会调用事件。By design this method does not call the event.

span.span: Writes asynchronously paginated content from a specified together with a to the target or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会验证或修改指定`printTicket`为特定。This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular . 如有必要，使用方法来创建特定于，对于指定打印机无效。If necessary, use the method to create a that is specific to the and is valid for a specified printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使事件处理程序替换为新为传递到写入操作。 enables an event handler to substitute a new for the one that is passed to the write operation. 以下四种并方法的确调用事件：The following four and methods do not call the event: - （字符串）(String) - (String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel) - （字符串）(String) - (String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel) ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件。The following example shows how to use the event.
